column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////With three of us there
column2: one of us did the HRW offering and the other two of us just ordered off the regular menu. Definitely go during HRW if you get a chance - that ended up not only being a good deal but also impressed the most. As for me
column4: which ended up being more of an Instagram photo than a culinary experience. The steak looked nicely cooked but some pieces were chewy. The salad was not "gigantic" in my opinion
column5: like the employee helping us said. And it ended up being nothing special but greens with some radishes
column8: and the steak. Not a bad salad but again
